body:
Hi again ... and sorry for asking so much. I have another issue here. I'm changing the construction materials with the setEPZoneCnstr component (according to video 16, i think) (see point 4 in attached). So far so good. Simulation is fine. The issue happens with the RadiantTempMap component when i connect the HB_Zones with the output of the setEPZoneCnstr component. Then i get the following message (see point 8 Bad): **1. For one of the meshes in the _viewFactorMesh, the number of faces in the mesh and test points in the _testPtsViewFactor do not match.**
**This can sometimes happen when you have geometry created with one Rhino model tolerance and you generate a mesh off of it with a different tolerance.**
**Try changing your Rhino model tolerance and seeing if it works.** When the connected zones coming from the output of point 3 in file it is OK. (You need the Custom file from my previous message). Any ideas? Thanks, -A.
